title: "Machine learning's potential for rapid LRTI diagnosis"
excerpt: "Training the Random forest model using this data allowed for predictions of LRTIs using 70 features (11 clinical, 39 lung microbiome, 20 host response). The diagnostic accuracy of the model was found to be 88.2%, and results were obtainable in a few hours, both significant improvements over traditional diagnostic approaches."
